text: Æðelnoð se gerefa to Eastorege & Gænburg his wif aræddan hiora erfe beforan Wulfrede arcebiscope & æðelhune his mæsseprioste & Esne cyninges ðegne.
Suæ hueðer hiora suæ leng lifes were foe to londe & to alre æhte.
Gif hio bearn hæbbe ðonne foe ðæt ofer hiora boega dagas to londe & to æhte.

Gif hio ðonne bearn næbbe & Wulfred archibiscop lifes sie þonne foe he to ðæm londe & hit forgelde & ðæt wiorð gedæle fore hiora gastas suæ ælmeslice & suæ rehtlice suæ he him seolfa on his wisdome geleornie.
& ða sprece nænig mon uferran dogor on nænge oðre halfe oncærrende sie nymne suæ þis gewrit hafað.
Þisses londes earan ðrie sulong æt Hægyðe ðorne.
& gif hiora oðrum oððe bæm suð for gelimpe biscop ðat lond gebycge suæ hie ðonne geweorðe.
